name: Bocholtz Romanum
description: Bocholtz Romanum is a mobile game for young and old, about the rich Roman history of Bocholtz and its surroundings. A secret organization is out to steal valuable Roman artifacts! Help the professor stop these villains by traveling back in time and getting to know the Romans who lived in Bocholtz and South Limburg. Learn about these special artifacts handed down to us, and solve the mystery with this knowledge. Solve puzzles and unravel the exciting story of the Romans who lived here.
